EmailTemplate.name: 02-18-22 DBNK CUNA Event Email 1.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Join us at CUNA GAC to future-proof your digital banking
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Simple, made possible. Join us in Washington, D.C. to future-proof your digital banking CUNA GAC | Washington, D.C. | February 27 - March 1 | NCR Booth 737 CUNA Governmental Affairs Conference (CUNA GAC) is the credit union industry’s premier advocacy event. It’ll be back again as a live, in-person event February 27- March 1 in our Nation’s Capital and NCR is proud to be part of it. With our theme, "Accelerate, Transform, Connect," we’ll show how we can help you differentiate with digital. NCR’s innovative digital solutions are changing the future of banking with exceptional advances in member experience. We understand that digital banking isn’t one-size-fits-all for every credit union. That’s why we give YOU the power to control your digital future — and the tools to adapt and grow as the market evolves and your business needs shift. This puts your focus back on your members. Visit NCR at Booth 737 at CUNA to discover: - Easy account onboarding on every channel - Intelligent data and insights for personalized experiences - Crypto wallet and payment capabilities that modernize how money moves - Developer tools and APIs to differentiate your member experiences - Digital-first experiences across all channels - 100s of integrated features and fintech solutions available on any core - Proactive financial wellness tools - And more! We hope to see you in DC! Learn more about NCR at CUNA GAC <[[https://www.ncr.com/banking/cuna-gac-2022?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=2022_Feb_CUNA_DigitalBanking&utm_content=Email1&utm_industry=banking&utm_sub-industry=Digital_Banking]]> Schedule a meeting with us at CUNA GAC <[[https://www.ncr.com/banking/cuna-gac-2022?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=2022_Feb_CUNA_DigitalBanking&utm_content=Email1&utm_industry=banking&utm_sub-industry=Digital_Banking]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
